bandaranayakathissamaharama poson maha punya uthsawaya ha ruhunu poson perahara thissamaharama sandagiriya ubhaya rajamaha wiharadhipathi mathara kandabadapaththuwa saha hambanthota depalathe pradhana sanghanayaka dewalegama dhammasena nahimiyange anushasana paridi pawathwimata katayuthu yoda atha.juni masa 23 dina perahara thissamaharama wiharasthanaye sita sadhathuka karanduwa peratu karagena maha sangharathnaya wadama karawima udarata pahatharata sabaragamuwa ha ruhunu pradeshayata aawenika natumwalin da ali athungen da yuthuwa perahara widi sancharaya kere.

ekthara widihakata gamata dhanawadi samaja kramaya awilla, gamata chanda kramaya labila, game samagiya nathi karala, apage purushartha, hara paddathi ekka kohomada gama wenas wune kiyana eka thamayi nawakathawe dakwana pulul samaja chithraya.
ihatha sandahan kala paridi, merata pihiti amerikanu thanapathi karyalaya madihath wi illa sitimata tharam, adala pudgalaya amarikawata ithama wadagath pudgalayeku wiya yuththeya.

shri lanka janadhipathi maithripala sirisena matha di pawath wu pa්rasiddha katha magin agamathi ranil wika්ramasinhage eksath jathika paksha (ejapa) saha janadhipathige shri lanka nidahas paksha (shrilanipa) “sammuthi” aanduwe thiwa්ra wana arbudaya pennum karayi.

boruwen goda nagana me ninditha aacharya satana mardhanayen awasan kota asarana sarasawi sisunta siya usas adhyapana ayithiwasikama nawum aakarayakata nopamawama salasa diya yuthuyi.usas adhyapanaya rate buddhiye sankethayayi, helaye maharaja thumath, aarakshaka lekam wiruwath, jathi hithaishi siyalu denath me wathikanu kumanthranayedi usas adhyapanaya hela daruwanta raka dimata idiripath wewa.
me widiyata hada gath mishranayata karat, liks, gowa ekathu kara winadiyak pamana thabanna.
mata kanna awashya yayi sitha kawrun ho maralath na.
issara math hari unanduyi lankawe dewal gana.

eekayi hethuwa. ...

jiwamana swarupayenma wada sitina prabhutharathna budun wahansege sharirayen nawatha warak "sadhu sadhu shakyamuni budun wahansa, oba wahanse deshana karana saddharma pundarika suthraya shrawanaya kirimata mama mehi paminiyemi" kiyana handa nikuth wenawa.
ee sambandhayen madhyawedin mudal amathawarayagen karunu wimasuwe ohu ada mahanuwara sancharayaka yedi sitiyadiya.
eeth ara pandithayek awilla yasata karagena hiti wadeta wisak dammane, "mun maha nasaraniyoya, hondata hondayi, narakata anthima narakayi, poddak pama wunoth bellama yanawa" kiyala.

paranawithana mahatha meheyawana nawa arahadi pahan pujawa, 8.00 sita rupawahiniya thulin bauddha wehera wihara sthana narambaima.bambalapitiya siriwajiraramaye poho da wadasatahan wisthara mese ya.perawaru 6.00 – 7.15 sil samadan karawima anushasanawa saha buddha pujawa, siri wajiraramadhipathi rajakiya panditha thrikunamale aananda anunayaka himi, 8.00 – 9.00 dharmanushasanawa siri wajirarama daham pasale upa pradhanacharya migoda sukhitha himi, 9.00 – 9.30 jathaka katha pothen siri wajiraramawasi pitipana sasanarathana himi, 9.30 – 11.00 bhawanawa saha anushasanawa gampaha pasadika himi, 11.00 – 11.15 buddha pujawa parakumpura wisharada himi, paswaru 12.30 – 1.30 sethpirith saha theruwan guna sajjhayanawa siri wajirarama daham pasal pradhanacharya kambaurugamuwe mahanaga himi, 1.30 – 2.30 dharmasakachchawa panditha waligepola silawansha himi, 3.00 – 4.00 dharmanushasanawa siri wajiranyana dharmayathanawasi diyathalawe piyadassi himi, 4.00 – 5.00 gihi deshanawa gampaha disthrikkaye piriwen guru upadeshaka shasthrapathi jayasena edirisinhasurihu, 5.00 – 6.30 atawisi buddha pujawa saha sil aluth kirima siri wajirarama swamin wahansela.aruppitiye pihiti shri shanthiyogashramaye di nawam pura pasaloswaka poho dina sila bhawana wadasatahana winayacharya haburugala dhammasiddhi mahimiyange pradhanathwayen pawathwe.
